name: FishOut
description:
Challenge your post-apocalyptic friend to an unlikely competition.

In this game you face the other player in a 1v1 boat race through a toxic wasteland. 

There is a catch though: fishing is involved. The local fauna does not seem very appetizing, but it surely has some other uses, right? You'll figure it out.

Bring your buddy or try playing vs the silly AI, and see if you can be the first one to cross the finish line. Watch out for sharks though. Sharks ruin everything.
